title: Dairy free peach crumble
ingredients: ['800g ripe peaches', '2 tablespoons light brown soft sugar', '125g plain flour', '100 to 125g caster sugar, depending on the sweetness of the peaches', '1 level teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '50g coconut oil']
